projects.title: Project Vajra
projects.desc: A Python-based pentesting toolkit with a React + Electron frontend for network scanning and vulnerability analysis.

projects.title: IoT VR Gauntlet
projects.desc: A gesture-controlled VR glove integrating flex sensors, haptic feedback, and BLE communication for immersive control.

projects.title: ChatConnect
projects.desc: A real-time chat web app using React, Node.js, and Socket.IO with secure authentication and message storage.

projects.title: CryptoVault
projects.desc: A decentralized file storage and encryption platform built with IPFS and blockchain integration.

projects.title: FitTrack
projects.desc: A health tracking web app that monitors calories, workouts, and progress using interactive charts and APIs.
